hero.headline: Your Grocery List, Intelligently Reimagined
hero.subHeadline: Shop smarter with lists that automatically sort for your path in any store, and gain clear insights into your spending.
hero.description: YAGA learns your shopping habits, auto-sorts your lists, tracks spending patterns, and works with your household‚Äîmaking every grocery trip simpler and more informed.
hero.phoneAltLight: App screenshot on iPhone mockup (Light Mode)
hero.phoneAltDark: App screenshot on iPhone mockup (Dark Mode)

smartSorting.title: Smart Store-Based Sorting
smartSorting.description: Never zigzag through the store again. Your grocery list automatically reorders itself based on the way you shop at each store, creating the most efficient path for your unique routine.
smartSorting.feature1: Personalized sorting for every store you visit
smartSorting.feature3: Remembers your route and order automatically

aiRecognition.title: AI-Powered Item Recognition
aiRecognition.description: Write your grocery list in any language‚ÄîYAGA understands, tags, and categorizes everything for you. Items from your scanned grocery receipts are also interpreted, tagged, and categorized, and made available in your shopping trip history.
aiRecognition.feature1: Multi-language support for your grocery list
aiRecognition.feature2: Smart tagging and categorization of all items
aiRecognition.feature3: Interprets, tags, and categorizes each item in your scanned receipts‚Äîavailable in your shopping trip history

examples.input: the tasty bread that your mother bought last week

purchaseMemory.title: Smart Purchase Memory
purchaseMemory.description: Never wonder "When did I last buy this?" again. Instantly see when you last purchased any item‚Äîhelping you avoid duplicates, reduce waste, and shop with confidence.

annotations.categoryRecent: Some milk product was last bought 3 days ago.
annotations.exactItem: "Whole Milk" was last bought 12 days ago.

modal.annotation: View your household's shopping history for milk.

analytics.title: Spending Analytics
analytics.description: Scan your receipts to unlock powerful insights into your grocery spending. See totals and trends by category, drill down to individual items, and track your habits over time‚Äîwhether it's the last month, quarter, or year. Discover where your money goes and spot opportunities to save.
analytics.feature1: Spending breakdown by category and item
analytics.feature2: See totals, averages, and trends over time
analytics.feature3: Drill down to see spending on individual items within each category

ourPromise.title: Our Promise to You
ourPromise.subtitle: Try risk-free and experience smarter grocery shopping with complete confidence.

promises.title: 2-Week Free Trial
promises.description: Try all features completely free for 14 days. No commitments, no hidden fees.

promises.title: Cancel Anytime
promises.description: Unsubscribe during your trial period and you won't be charged. No questions asked.

promises.title: Transparent Pricing
promises.description: Multiple plans to choose from. What you see is what you pay‚Äîno surprise charges.

banner.title: Ready to Transform Your Shopping?
banner.description: Download the app and choose from our <highlight>flexible subscription plans</highlight>. Start your <highlight>14-day free trial</highlight> instantly‚Äîno payment required upfront. If you're not completely satisfied, simply cancel before the trial ends.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about getting started with YAGA.

questions.question: How do I invite other people to my household?
questions.answer: Navigate to the menu in the bottom navigation bar, open your household's detail page (press the info icon), copy the invitation code and send it to the people you want to invite. Only household administrators can invite people to a household.

questions.question: How do I join a household for free?
questions.answer: You can use YAGA for free if you get an invite code from another subscriber. Download the app, create your account, and select "Join Existing Household" instead of buying a subscription. Enter your invite code, and voila!

questions.question: How many members can I invite to my household?
questions.answer: Depending on your subscription plan, you can invite either 4 or 8 other members. There is no limit to total members in a household‚Äîif other household members also have a subscription, they can invite people to the household too (provided they are made admin for the household).

questions.question: How does the app know which store I'm shopping at?
questions.answer: YAGA uses your location to automatically detect when you arrive at a known grocery store. If it's the first time you (or any other YAGA user) shops at a given store, YAGA will discover and learn the store when your shopping trip completes. The next time you shop at the same store, YAGA recognizes it and will sort your grocery list accordingly.

questions.question: What if the app doesn't recognize my local store?
questions.answer: YAGA will occasionally struggle with discovering a store, though this is rare. We are continually working to improve store discovery. If the problem persists, please reach out to us at contact@vallesoftwarelabs.com.

questions.question: What happens to my data if I delete my account?
questions.answer: When you delete your account, we delete all personal data tied to you. Data that belongs to your households, like shopping history, will not be deleted unless you are the-only member of those households‚Äîin which case the households and all their data will also be deleted.

questions.question: How do I delete my account and data?
questions.answer: Navigate to the menu in the bottom navigation bar, go to the Account view, and press Delete Account. Please note that we cannot cancel your subscription on your behalf, so remember to also cancel your subscription if you no longer want to use YAGA.
